column2: The appellant in  his Dock statement has made a total denial when

column1: there  has  been  a  strong  prima  -
column2: facie  case  against  him.  The  appellant

column1: has failed  to  explain on  the third  charge for which  he was convicted.

column2: On  perusal of the judgment given by learned High Court Judge it is

column1: quite clear that the  learned  High  Court Judge has carefully analysed the

column2: evidence  placed  before  the  High  Court.  This  court  is  not  inclined  to  set

column1: aside a judgment which  has been delivered after careful consideration.

column2:
reasons  we  affirm 
the  judgment  and 
the

column1: conviction dated 08/06/2017 and dismiss the appeal.

column2: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
